sentences.sContent: The door clicked shut behind me.
sentences.sCn: 门在我身后咔嗒一声关上了。

sentences.sContent: Mother clicked her tongue (= made a short sound to show disapproval ) and sighed.
Edmund clicked his fingers (= made a short sound to get someone’s attention ) for John to follow him.
sentences.sCn: 埃德蒙弹了个响指示意约翰跟着他。

sentences.sContent: Vogel clicked his heels (= hit the heels of his shoes together ) and bowed.
sentences.sCn: 沃格尔咔嗒一声并拢脚跟，鞠了个躬。

sentences.sContent: Twist the lever and the gears click into place .
sentences.sCn: 转动变速杆，排挡就咔嗒一声到位了。

phrases.pCn: 点击这里，点击此处；单击此处

trans.tranOther: to make a short hard sound, or make something produce this sound
